markdown_en.description: a string with markdown markup in English.

markdown_i18n.description: a string with markdown markup for a particular language, where language is presented as the suffix of the property in the form of <foo>#<language>.

string_en_not_empty.description: a string in English, cannot be the empty string.

string_i18n.description: a string for a particular language, where language is presented as the suffix of the property in the form of <foo>#<language>.

slug_top.description: a string containing only safe characters for use in a slug (top level. must not contain a slash)

slug.description: a string containing only safe characters for use in a slug

uuid.description: an UUID, expressed as hexadecimal chars

uuidDefaultEmpty.description: an UUID, expressed as hexadecimal chars, but if not provided, the empty string is returned

links.title: Create user
links.description: A user can be a staff/organizer, speaker, or a regular attendee. Information should be obtained from facebook/twitter/github
